## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G29200](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G29200)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCM1, CM1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA CHORISMATE MUTASE 1, chorismate mutase 1
- **Description:**   chorismate mutase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
